title: [LFT] Plat1 Top Laner
body:
Looking for a team to play with
Best at Top > Mid > ADC. 


IGN: Reflexion

replies.body:
Hey man my ranked team is looking for a top lane main. We currently have a diamond adc, diaomnd mid, diaomnd sup and plat 2 jungler.
I'll be on tonight around 5 if you are interested in being apart of it :)
